                                    org.apache.lucene.search.Query query)
        Removes documents from Lucene index, matching a query.
        Parameters:
        appid - appid
        query - queries which documents to remove

      • deleteIndex

        public static void deleteIndex(String appid)
        Deletes the entire index.
        Parameters:
        appid - appid

      • rebuildIndex

        public static boolean rebuildIndex(DAO dao,
                                   String appid,
                                   Pager... pager)
        Rebuilds an index. Reads objects from the data store and indexes them. Works on one DB table and index only.
        Parameters:
        dao - DAO for connecting to the DB - the primary data source
        appid - the index name (alias)
        pager - a Pager instance
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if index doesn't exist or failed.

      • paraObjectToDocument

        public static org.apache.lucene.document.Document paraObjectToDocument(String appid,
                                                                       Map<String,Object> data)
        Converts a ParaObject to Lucene Document. Takes care of nested objects and indexes them separately. Stores the original object data as JSON text inside the "_source" field.
        Parameters:
        appid - an appid
        data - object data - keys and values
        Returns:
        a Document object

      • documentToParaObject

        public static <P extends ParaObject> P documentToParaObject(org.apache.lucene.document.Document doc)
        Reads the JSON from "_source" field of a document and turns it into a ParaObject.
        Type Parameters:
        P - type
        Parameters:
        doc - Lucene document
        Returns:
        a ParaObject or null if source is missing

      • searchGeoQuery

        public static <P extends ParaObject> List<P> searchGeoQuery(DAO dao,
                                                            String appid,
                                                            String type,
                                                            org.apache.lucene.search.Query query,
                                                            String queryString,
                                                            Pager... pager)
        Geopoint distance query. Finds objects located near a center point.
        Type Parameters:
        P - object type
        Parameters:
        dao - DAO
        appid - appid
        type - object type to search for
        query - a geopoint query
        queryString - query string for filtering results
        pager - a Pager
        Returns:
        a list of ParaObjects
